title: 3.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
Benefits of fruits

Create a Scratch project to showcase the benefits of fruits based on the following algorithm.

Step 1: Set up the fruit sprites and backdrop.
Step 2: Display “Click on the fruit to listen to its benefits”.
Step 3: When the fruit is clicked generate music followed by its benefits.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
